author: nbubna
msg: remove commons-logging.properties to avoid infinite loops when run on Tomcat 5.5.x

author: rich
msg: Added notes on the Tomcat 5.5.x Windows JAR-locking problem (http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-960), and instructions for working around it when redeploying a web application.

author: hogstrom
msg: Removed extra spaces in web.xml that was causing problems in deployment

author: tfischer
msg: Put book table at the end of the schema.xml in order to have all tables declared to which foreign keys exist
Thanks to Jean T. Anderson for pointing out the problem
